name: Scurry Up!
description:
Summary

You're a vampire rat janitor tasked with cleaning this entire filthy building in just one night. 🐭🦇

Xbox controller required for input. 🎮

Credits

2D Art Assets - Morgan Clowes, Grace Collas, Sam Wyper

3D Art Assets - Stuart Turner, Becky Saunders

Blueprinting - Becca Marshall

Concept Art - Morgan Clowes, Sam Wyper

Level Design - Mia Tidnam, Becca Marshall

Project Management - Becky Saunders

Textures - Stuart Turner, Sam Wyper, Grace Collas, Morgan Clowes

Audio Credits

Spooky Royalty Free Halloween Music - DiamondFire

Broom Sweep - goose_bumps

Cartoon Bat/Mouse Squeak - Breviceps

Dust Rustle - Galbenshire

Hop - felixyadomi
